author: dkhaywood
msg: Added isVisibleDeclaratively / isVisibleForSession and also isUsableDeclaratively / isUsableForSession - reinstating more fine-grained checking for XAT2, but preserving existing semantics for DnD/html viewers.

author: dkhaywood
msg: XAT2: made tests more lax in lieu of Rob's recent bug fixes.  However this should be considered a work-around.  Bug 192 explains what's been done and what needs to be re-considered to reinstate the original behaviour (if we decide to go that way).
